PackageSetup()

set(Package_source_setup
	URL http://it.apache.contactlab.it/tomcat/tomcat-6/v6.0.32/bin/apache-tomcat-6.0.32.zip
	URL_MD5 082a0707985b6c029920d4d6d5ec11cd
)
PackageBinaryAdd()
